A piece I did a few days ago. Always feel like freshwater fish do not get enough attention 🙂 🐟
Oh thank you so much for sharing it, it made a great start to my day 😊

IT'S HERE AND IT'S PERFECT!

THANK YOU! I LOVE IT!
Underwater hunt; there is so much happening under water 🐟
Marine motifs are my favourite ones to draw and therefore I was excited to make this commission piece for Environmental Pillar addressing the protection of seagrass meadows in Ireland.

Apparently today is Cat Day in Japan! 🌷✨🐈‍⬛🐈✨🌷

Brilliant; I would love to do them myself, to be able to observe fish from close distance. Hopefully one day :-)
Kelp forest is a forest too 🐟 😀 🐬

As always he barely even checks the facts but just repeats the major western narrative. Navalny was siding with fascists and recording videos calling for extermination of ethnic minorities in Russia. He was an ultra nationalist not much different from Putin and would be equally bad if ever elected.
Thank you so much for all the kind words, likes and shares. Really appreciate the support 😊🙏
It is my birthday today and if you wanted to give me a little gift you can share my artwork 😉
Thank you for the shout out 😊

A new piece. Cats on the roofs 🐈
He's back in New York City 🦊
Life in the Sea is my latest addition to our etsy store. 15% off. Check it out: etsy.me/49go0Xq
A sheer lunacy or a fully realistic plan? Can we bring the wolf back to Ireland? Some facts and opinions with a good doze of wolfy illustrations: etsy.me/473WRFs

When did wolves disappear from Ireland? Is it a realistic goal to reintroduce them into our ecosystem? You can find answers to those questions in my new zine:

etsy.me/3Mfk8Mq

I wanted to do this zine for a long time and now it's finally here. You can grab a copy in my etsy store. Check it out to learn more about the pros and cons of reintroducing wolves into Ireland and see if it's even realistic 🐺

etsy.me/46GMffJ
The kelp forest is a forest too 🐟
Yay my other Bsky art purchase arrived! Shout out to @@1868 for his lovely work
Oh thank you so much for sharing this. The quality looks really good 😊

It is #PortfolioDay.

My name is Jacek. I am an illustrator that loves all things related to nature, with a particular focus on the forest and underwater scenes. 

Instagram: www.instagram.com/big.hippo.art/
Thank you Emil. Yes we absolutely love the city.
Thank you and thanks again for the recommendations you gave me a while ago :-)

Two different illos with kelp forests. One more murky and one much brighter. Which one is your favourite?
Hi everyone! First post here 💙 My name is Marissa, and I’m an illustrator who loves painting fantasy, nature, and cute animals 🐥🌱✨

That's great. Thanks for letting me know

I’m trying to get back into the swing of things and attempt some more studies. It’ll be a bit messy, but hopefully I’ll learn a lot 💪

Hi! I'm Hagai Palevsky, and I'm a writer, critic, and translator.

My work in comics, prose, and criticism are all available in various formats, with more of everything on the way.

Always on the lookout for new projects.
Same username on other platforms.

My name is Trevor Fraley and I'm a Character Designer /Illustrator that's worked in comics and children's books. Lets connect!

You can find more of my work at trevorfraley.com!

It's #PortfolioDay; My name is Jacek, new to Blue Sky and quite obsessed with drawing all things nature related, water in particular.

https://www.instagram.com/big.hippo.art/
A little piece inspired from my trip to Scotland, the forests there felt positively primordial!
Hi Loish; thank for doing this thread. I am Jacek, just migrated here yesterday and trying to navigate in the new, blue world with my nature art
Flower sharks are gliding through the sky
Thank you; delighted to be here :-)
Hello world. Just migrated from twitter and settling in here. My name is Jacek and I love doing all things nature related. Hope to catch up with yous all in the coming days :-)
